description:
Hijinks ensue when strange creatures and old acquaintances pay the Ronaldo Vampire Hunter Agency a visit.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Eros Yue ni Metamorphose / Daidokoro Liberal Force / Sono Otoko no Na wa Handa
I Have Desire, Therefore I Metamorphose / Kitchen Liberal Force / The Man`s Name Is Handa
Éros, la métamorphose / Les forces de la cuisine / Cet homme s`appelle Handa
愛[エロス]ゆえに変態[メタモルフォーゼ] / 台所リベラルフォース / その男の名は半田
